description:
There are men who try to earn an easy buck by settling their hopes on pachinko, only to fail miserably. Regretting their decision, Gintoki and Hasegawa are sucking on their ice candies bought with the dropped change they collected, when they overhear something about a moneymaking opportunity. A reward has been placed on a space creature that’s been haunting the beach. Gintoki and Hasegawa propose to fish out the alien and grab the reward, and the Odd Jobs gang head out to the beach. But what awaits them there is a deserted beach and an old man making yakisoba noodles at the beach house. And the reward in fact turns out to be…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Umi no Mizu ga Naze Shoppai ka da to? Omeera Tokaijin ga Oyoginagara Youzoku Shitekukara Darou gaaa!!
Weshalb Meerwasser salzig ist? Weil ihr Großstädter ständig ins Meer pinkelt!
Why`s the Sea So Salty? Because You City Folk Pee Whenever You Go Swimming!
海の水がなぜしょっぱいかだと? オメーら都会人が泳ぎながら用足してくからだろーがァァ!!
